title: The performance and mechanism of phosphotungstic acid -modified NiFe-LDHs heterogeneous photo-Fenton catalyst for efficient degradation of tetracycline
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00476K, Paper
Siqi Bao, Shuanghui Sun, Yuting Zhou, Yanshu Chen, Yunfeng Wu
There is a serious risk to human health because of the misuse of tetracycline and the ineffective wastewater treatment system, which has left a lot of antibiotics in the environment....
